Change Log¶

v0.1.13¶

  • Add a max upload file size (https://github.com/DigitalCampus/django-oppia/issues/8) - this prevent users uploading large course files which may make it difficult for end users to download on slow connections

v0.1.12¶

  • Initial release (all previous versions were for alpha testing)
